duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate various construction Cranes to move equipment and other materials.
Plan operational lifts and inspect equipment.
Responsible for all safety aspects of operating the equipment.
Follow signal directions from a signaler in equipment operations and access area of operations for safety issues and required processes.

education_certification.credential: Current National Commission for the Certification of Crane Operators (NCCCO) credentials for the appropriate type of crane and current Crane Operator physical.
Valid driver’s license and motor vehicle records check.
